product_name: Shimano Click'R CT45 Bike Shoes - Men's
long_description: Are you venturing into bike commuting? The Shimano Click'R CT45 bike shoes feature a solid platform for cycling as well as a great walking design. Synthetic leather/nylon mesh uppers are ruggedly built for long wear; breathable mesh aids ventilation. Traditional lace-up closures for even tension; rip-and-stick closure straps over laces hold feet securely. Built on a generous last for a roomy and more accommodating toe box. Reinforced toe helps protect the uppers from brush and toe-clip abrasion. EVA midsoles enhance pedaling efficiency and walking comfort; fiberglass reinforcement enhances rigidity, stability and support. Recessed cleat attachment points in the Shimano Click'R CT45 bike shoes make for easy walking. Rubber tread pattern delivers walking traction. Cleats not included on these Shimano Click'R CT45 bike shoes.
short_description: Are you venturing into bike commuting? The Shimano Click'R CT45 bike shoes feature a solid platform for cycling as well as a great walking design.
